Class ModifyProductScreenController

java.lang.Object
com.example.software_1_project.ModifyProductScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyProductScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the Modify Product screen.
